name: node-radius-utils
description: Utilities for working with radius in node. For use with libraries such as [node-radius](https://www.npmjs.com/package/radius#dictionaries).

scripts.build:dictionaries: echo "export default " > src/dictionaries.interface.ts && json-ts src/dictionaries.json --rootName Dictionaries >> src/dictionaries.interface.ts

author: w3cj
